column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I love to travel the USA , and recently , the world .
#text=Without the advent of the modern airplane this would be both very time consuming and very expensive .
#text=To save money , I like to research fares by time and location .
#text=We live in a small city so many times we can drive a few hours and save a lot of money by flying out of that airport .
#text=When I get to the airport , I check my bags and go through security .
#text=After passing through security , I like to check my email , talk to family and friends , and do some reading over a cup of coffee .
#text=Then we shut down the phone and get on the plane .
#text=I love the window seat and enjoy watching the clouds and the ground below us as we are flying to the destination .
#text=Upon landing I head out to the next destination .
